thought: To craft a red_sandstone_wall, I need to place 6 red_sandstone blocks in a row in the crafting grid. There are 6 red_sandstone blocks in slot 44, so I will move them to the crafting grid starting at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 44 to slot 1 with quantity 1
